#  Worldwide Motorcycle Tours & Expeditions

#  Ride Your Own Ride

#  Once in a Lifetime Journeys

#  Epic Motorcycle Tours

#  Your Adventure - Our Expertise

  *   *   *   * 

Unique & incredible global motorcycle tours in Africa, Americas, Asia &
Europe. Discover the road less travelled with us. Explore the world supported
by our expert team of professional adventurers!

We give you the freedom to self-navigate and ride your own ride. We do NOT
ride in convoy. We supply a daily road book, GPS routes and GPS mapping. Or
just relax and follow your Tour Manager.

Ride an extraordinary journey with our unmatched expertise in life-changing
motorcycle expeditions. "Alaska to Patagonia" or the Silk Road from "London to
Beijing", nobody does it better!

We have a motorcycle journey for you! How about circumnavigating Iceland? You
can explore the northern mountains of Thailand or discover the stunning Garden
Route in South Africa. Click to explore!

Embark on an extraordinary journey with our team of world-riding experts,
backed by over 22 years of experience. Ride your own adventure and enjoy our
support every step of the way.

### GlobeBusters Expeditions & Tours

## MOTORCYCLE EXPEDITION SPECIALISTS

### Over 2,000 customers, have ridden pioneering adventure motorcycle tours
across 6 continents & over 70 countries with GlobeBusters

Founded by Guinness World Record Holders for global motorcycle travel, Kevin &
Julia Sanders, GlobeBusters is one of the worlds’ leading adventure motorcycle
tour and expedition operators.

* * *

##

###  Motorcycle Expeditions

We are the ultimate motorcycle expedition specialists!  We trace our roots
back to 1999 when we rode from the USA to Argentina.  Then our Guinness World
Records in 2002 and 2003 for global motorcycling – **Circumnavigation of the
World** and the **Trans Americas**.

We have twenty years of expertise in overland motorcycle travel.  No other
global motorcycle tour operator can match our record in expertly delivering
long distance motorcycle expeditions!

So trust us – our motorcycle expeditions are epic! Whether it’s legendary
routes or crossing continents, they are the stuff that dreams are made of.
Some routes are from coast to coast, some cross the Equator, others are from
the top to the bottom of the world, and all taking the road less travelled.

View Motorcycle Expeditions

###  Motorcycle Adventure Tours

We are the pioneers in offering worldwide motorcycle adventure tours.  Back in
a time when South America was not part of other operator’s offerings, we were
already leading riders through Patagonia and Peru.  Over the years, the
destinations we offer has expanded to Africa, Europe and Asia.

So book a motorcycle adventure tour to sample the best bits of our major
expedition routes or other exciting destinations – Iceland, Morocco, Thailand,
Turkey, Namibia and more.  Choose motorcycle rental or use your own bike.

These adventure motorcycle tours are awesome experiences of shorter duration.
They embrace the GlobeBusters philosophy – to ride your own ride and create
your own journey, whilst receiving expert dedicated support from the savvy
GlobeBusters team.

View Adventure Tours

## Stay connected to the GlobeBusters community

Discover the world with GlobeBusters and on the most fascinating worldwide
adventure motorcycle tours on the roads less travelled, with the GlobeBusters
team to support you.  
YOUR ADVENTURE – OUR EXPERTISE!

**Excellent**

Based on **32 reviews**

Eric Laurence Robotham

2023-03-19

We joined the Thailand Tour, it was our first with GlobeBusters, and it was
well organised and a nice relaxed atmosphere, with people riding with the tour
leader, on their own or as small groups as they desired. The sat nav routes
were perfect (with maps provided as well) and well thought through. I
thoroughly recommend them.

Chris Stone

2023-01-11

I hear great things about thier tours website very good

Richard Bowden-Doyle

2022-11-27

Recently back from my second expedition with Globebusters. I've ridden from
London to Beijing and Nairobi to Cape Town with them. I can't think of anybody
I'd trust more to arrange long distance trips across challenging territories.
They're professional, well organised and committed but most important of all,
they're great fun to travel with...

Mark Hailwood

2022-11-24

Having travelled with Globebusters on two amazing Expeditions I have nothing
but praise for this organisation. Both trips (Trans Am and Southern Africa)
far exceeded my expectations and left me only wanting more of these fantastic
experiences. The organisation, planning, information, routes, accommodation,
and the Globebusters team on the trip could not have been improved upon.  
So you may ask am I travelling with them again, well the answer is of course,
2023 is Trans Am 2 for me it really was that good. So don't sit around
thinking these trips are for everyone else or they will be as they are always
in great demand, and to be honest 5 stars isn't really enough.  
Mark Hailwood

Roger Andersson

2022-10-28

Absolutely the best motorcycle tour operator

Jonathan Parrott

2022-09-12

I have just completed the Iceland Arctic Dessert Ride. Wow! what can I say
fantastic. From the pre tour administration and bike shipping to the actual
riding was all OUTSTANDING. The group leader (John) and support driver (Rhys)
provided guidance on riding, especially the off-road sections and were always
there to help; a credit to the GlobeBusters team. The accommodation was
excellent, and the daily rides were well thought through and of the
appropriate distance. For a newbie to of road riding this tour provided a
fantastic opportunity to improve, with the rides increasing progressively in
difficulty over the 10 days. I will definitely be booking future tours with
GloBebusters, including some of the longer trips and will recommend them to
others. Thank you GlobeBusters.

Ken Shanks

2022-09-11

I just completed Globebuster's Icelandic Tour and it was fantastic. Iceland is
the most beautiful country I have visited and the tour Globebusters put on was
fantastic, professionally run, organized, great, courteous, & fun tour
leaders, very good mix of on-road and off-road rides each day, very good and
clean hotels, great food (not a bad meal), and they provided great information
for each day's ride which allowed us to ride with the larger group or set our
own pace and ride our own ride. If you are an adventure motorcycle rider, and
want to see some amazing places few others will ever see, you can't go with
Globebusters!

George revington

2022-09-08

Best Motorcycle tour out there for great routes and just the right amount of
adventure

Niall Rowan

2022-06-15

“Globebusters Aegean Adventure tour of Turkey is a full on cultural,
historical and motorcycling experience delivered by a very professional tour
guide. The roads, the riding and the scenery just has to be seen.
Accommodation is top notch and you are guaranteed to have a great time and
lasting memories. Do it now!”

> GlobeBusters Motorcycle Expeditions

Privacy Overview

This website uses cookies so that we can provide you with the best user
experience possible. Cookies are files saved on your phone, tablet or computer
generated when you visit a website and performs functions such as recognising
you when you return to our website and helping our team to understand which
sections of the website you find most interesting and useful.

Strictly Necessary Cookies

These essential cookies do things like: remembering the notifications you've
seen so we do not show them to you again or your progress through a form. They
always need to be on.

Enable or Disable Cookies

3rd Party Cookies

We use a set of third party tools to provide information of how our users
engage with our website so that we can improve the experience of the website
for our users. For example, we collect information about which of our pages
are most frequently visited, and by which types of users. We also use third-
party cookies to help with performance.

Enable or Disable Cookies

Please enable Strictly Necessary Cookies first so that we can save your
preferences!
